abstract: For better or worse, you, fellow taxpayer, are an investor in Citigroup and other banks. You have a vested interest in Citigroup’s success. If this giant falls, we all lose.

lead_paragraph: Wall Street often portrays itself as a pay-for-performance meritocracy. The rules are supposed to be simple: Make money, and you get rich. Lose it, and you get fired.
